start.state: I'm off duty and in the mood for some fun! I saw this place on Streaming-chan's site and had to check it out for myself.
Oh my god, Deal! When were you hired as a Dealer? Did Seifer fire you? Well, whatever the reason, it suits you!
I'll have to head out if I hear trouble outside though. Hopefully I won't be naked when I do, I bet you'd see that on The Augmented Eye within the hour!
Do we really have to masturbate if we lose or did Streaming-chan set that up? I mean... if that's really what's happening, I guess rules are rules.
Almost can't believe I'm doing this...I must be drunk already. Are my cheeks red?
It's nice to let off steam sometimes, y'know? Today I dragged people out of a car crash, helped put out a fire, rescued a kitten from a tree, and that was all before lunch!
I hope you don't mind if I have a few drinks in-between hands. Sweet and Icy, my favorite!

case.state: It's not even the first turn, but I have a feeling everyone here is super jacked. And Jill thought I should try and look more feminine for tonight.
At attention, Private ~player~. You're going to show us your privates before this is over, huh?
Someone's getting a little colder.
You had a good hand, don't get discouraged.
Looks like it's time...
*Kira* Miki!? Oh wait, no, different lilim. Wait a second, Alpha, are you a hologram?
Hey! Greenie! You're under arrest for the crimes on that card you held up! ...Just kidding.
Nadeshiko and R. Mika! Omigod! You’re here tonight? I saw your tag match against Rebel Hyena and Executioner Blizzard yesterday night!
Huh, it’s saying you’re a boomer, ~name~. Aren’t those usually using cat DNA? I’m getting weird readings from the gene scan…
Hmm... are you a hybrid of some sort, ~name~?
~name~, your armor must be super high end! I can barely see the compressors or hydraulic lines!
Wow! Is that Gravity-class powered armor, ~name~? That's really high end stuff!
Your armor looks super awesome? Is it bioregistry locked, or can I try it after the game?
Black hair's not exactly rare, but you look like you take... adequate care of it, at least!
Nice knife, ~name~. I deal with enough of those on a day to day basis, though. I'm interested in… um. Softer bits tonight.
I wonder if you handle your cock like you wield that blade, ~name~.
Oh, you remind of that hacker lady... what was her name... Alma?
Am I getting red in the face? 'Cause your hair reminds me of a Marsblast, obviously!
Always great to see other girls with blue hair, ~name~. Is it dyed, or natural for you, though? Can you guess if mine is?
Wow! A stealthsuit, right, ~name~? Uh, your bodysuit? Does it not have build in camo?
That bodysuit really shows off your assets! Sadly, the Valkyrie armor I have is built without a synaptic-- yours does have nervous feedback, doesn't it?
Bodysuits like that always seemed super cool to me.
You know, brown’s the most common hair color, ~name~, but it does tend to look good on just about anyone.
Wow! A natural brunette? It used to be such a common hair color, but surely you use a gene therapy, right, ~name~?
I've heard blondes have more fun, but brunettes get it done. That true, ~name~?
Oh wow! The famous ~name~! Or a very convincing likeness...
Ma’am, I'm going to have to detain you… for an autograph! Jill would be so jealous if you signed your…
Yikes. I'm not scared of clowns but the Riserio Gang uses paint like that… you better be careful, ~name~!
Huh. Occulite-based paint! It's hard to get a scan on your identity, ~name~. Could you say it for the record?
(I should probably arrest ~name~ but this is the first four hour break I've had in weeks.)
Hold on, there's a warrant for your arrest, ~name~! You're lucky the White Knights database is undergoing maintenance today.
I know who you are, ~name~. Enjoy the game but afterwards you need to come with me.
Say, ~name~, are you cosplaying, or are you really… you know, a time traveler? Or a wizard? Something like that?
Are you a wrestling fan too, ~name~? Or do you mostly fight for yourself?
~name~, your biometric scan has you registered with several combat operative licenses! Good for you for proactive self defense!
Handsome outfit, ~name~. You seem like you're very much a boardroom to bar type! It's a compliment! Really!
It’s always good to see someone else with modern sensibilities in 20XX, ~name~.
~name~... known associations… Oh! You're a pretty popular gamer, ~name~. Any recommendations?
Wow, a real redhead? I thought that gene died out years ago!
Your hair's bright, just like a Sunshine Cloud, ~name~.
Red hair like Stella's! She really should get out more. Especially to stuff like this.
Glasses, ~name~? You must be loaded! It's so much cheaper to just get realignment surgery where I'm from than glasses.
Green hair, huh? Like a Bad Touch! Give me a few drinks, and I might act that out for you!
Green hair used to be hard to come by, ~name~, but it still makes ID'ing a perp really easy.
Green hair? ~name~ looks like they could use a Crevice Spike!
Ugh. Did you need to bring a gun here?
Seriously, ~name~? This isn't a firing range! Well… maybe for the boys.
Huh. I guess the Inventory really does take all comers. And cummers, too!
~name~, I really hope you've never had to interact with Donovan Dawson… such an asshole.
Have you ever written for the Augmented Eye, ~name~?
You have a suspiciously spotless record for a lawyer, ~name~... Keep up the good work!
You're a professional… magical girl-- ohhh! I get it! Say hi to Dorothy Haze next time you're on the job!
You're a professional… mahou shoujo? Huh. That's a clever rebranding of the world's oldest profession.
So two medics walk into a bar… and get naked? I need to work on that.
One medic recognizes another. Let me buy you a drink! Icy and sweet, right?
Oh hey, ~name~, I recognize you from the trans-Megacorp medic conference! Great talk!
What division did you serve with, ~name~?
Wow! You served in the Dachshund Wars! Oh uh, that's a typo. Sorry, ~name~.
Whoa, I'm going to put your file back, ~name~. Lots of red tape.
You're even better in person, ~name~! Uh, compared to your record on my gauntlet.
I'm really bad at most music, ~name~, but I do play the harmonica pretty well!
Your hair's like your personality, ~name~! A sugar rush! That made sense in my head!
People used to think pink was only for women, but I think it looks good on just about everyone! Especially their heads!
Hey! Piracy is a crime, ~name~! Albeit an archaic, ill-defined one.
~name~, I'm usually happy to see a friend from across the thin blue line, but can we agree this game is out of our jurisdictions?
Whoa whoa whoa. No active cases here, ~name~.
You’re really scrappy, huh, ~name~?
~name~, I will say, you seem like quite a survivor.
You seem like you’ve had a rough go of it, ~name~...
A princess? Wow, I thought that was mostly a Megacorp thing, with the CEO’s kids and so on. I didn’t know real royalty was still around!
~name~, you're royalty or something, right? Have you ever tried that tea whiskey? It's hard to find but I've heard it's great!
I thought your hair was black at first, but it's really purple, isn't it, ~name~?
Huh. Now that I think of it, the only purple drink at VA11 HALL-A is the mercuryblast, and that's mostly blue...
Wow! Your hair really is purple! I thought it was just black with some of the UV lighting here!
You know, they say purple's the color of royalty! It's why Zaibatsu Corp picked it as one of our colors!
Do you mind if I see your ID ~name~? Sorry if I'm being overbearing, but you are wearing a school uniform.
What in the world is a schoolgirl doing here? I hope you're at least eighteen ~name~. Otherwise I'll have to escort you out.
I get the feeling you’re into some high tech stuff, ~name~. I don’t suppose you have anything on you right now…?
I think there’s a joke I could make about ~name~ and vacuum based suction… You know, because ~name~’s been out in space?
I think there's a little bit of intrigue about ~name~.
Your outfit reminds me of those super-elite Sentai Squad guys in the upper White Knights divisions...
A superhero? Pfft. There's lots of small heroes out there, but I think it's important to help people where you can instead of waiting for heroes.
So, ~name~, do you think visual novels are games? I kind of wonder about that myself sometimes.
I don't know why you'd bring a toy like that wand of yours… well, I do, but wouldn't you want to save it for the forfeit?
So are you just… did you seriously just show up with your personal toy on display for everyone?
Why did you bring your weapon to a friendly card game…?
Nice weapon, ~name~. Hope you know how to use it. Just not here.
If I were a cooler person, I'd say something edgy like “You brought a weapon, but a true White Knight is never unarmed!” or something.
Whoa! No way! You're ~name~ from that website, right?
I know I'm a White Knight, but white hair's a little... geriatric.
I'd say there's a drink like your hair, ~name~, but I'm not drunk enough to just go down on you.
Hey! It's not Halloween yet. But I like your mindset, ~name~!
Wait a second, you all need to show me some ID. There's too many school uniforms here for this to be a coincidence.
Wait a second, why is half the table wearing schoolgirl outfits? I hope you're all eighteen, or I'm escorting all of you out.
Aww, you shouldn't have, ~player~! Four blue-haired girls? A shame Rei can't join us.
Oh! Another White Knight! Lovely to have you here, but let's both agree not to tell our XO's.
So, where did Zaibatsu deploy you? I figure you're a Brunhilde-class, since you're so huge!
Ma’am, put down the weapon!
No firing into an unprotected auditorium, ma’am!
Aimee, I’ve heard of threepeats…
Okay, okay, Aimee. I think you’ve got this.
I’m going to be honest, I’m interested to see how you can pull this particular set of clothes off.
Alice, you're not planning on doing anything with that knife, are you?
Put down the knife slowly, please.
Oh, Aliiiice, you're gonna behave without that knife, right?
I really love a girl in thigh-highs...
Oh, do you know anything by *Kira* Miki, Alpha?
I know alcohol is technically a drug...
Amalia Sheran Sharm? The daughter of the Sadida Biotech Firm CEO?
Can you turn around while you strip again? I love the view! Oh! Please, yes.
A cat boomer! Wow, I didn't think there were any outside Glitch City. Did you get the treatment because of nanomachine rejection or as part of the fad?
Those ears! They're just like my best friend's!
Annie, there's something familiar about you. I swear I've seen you on television before.
Have you been on TV, Annie? You have that look about you.
Hmm... you have a very familiar face, Annie. Have we met before?
Cute sweater, Annie. But…
I know I said your sweater looked soft, but whatever’s next looks softer.
Ms. Leonhart, I've seen that look in your eyes in traumatized White Knights... you've seen terrible things, haven't you?
Excuse me, Miss April, I’ve heard rumors of a turtle-spliced group of vigilantes in the sewers.
What’s up with your ears, Arwen?
Oh wow, Asuna! That’s a popular holo-avatar for the (M^3)A.
Huh, lotsa people using avatars tonight. They’re cute, but why’d you bring those when you can see them in VR? Let’s see the real you, ~name~.
Wow! I love your arm, Beatrix!
Blackrose! That’s a classic avatar! But, why use that?
Huh, lots of people using avatars tonight. They’re cute, but why’d you bring those when you can see them in VR? Let’s see the real you, ~name~.
If I knew we were dressing up for this, I’d have put on some formal wear.
You saved the ribbon this long?
Hmm...
Oh, wow.
Oh yeah! Let’s see what our furry friend is working with.
Wow, a cross. Christianity hasn’t been a major religion for a few decades. Are you just rocking the look for style?
Whoa! Catria! Your equipment is amazing!
I can see why your armor is so fancy!
I can see all the shield and archival protocols under how pretty that armor looks! I don't know if the ditz thing is an act, but I'm liking you, Catria!
Hmm... can I look at that armor, Catria? I'll be looking at you too, but your armor is really cool!
Not that I've been looking too closely... but did you wear underwear, Catria...? Sexy if you didn't...
Aww, Catria, but that's part of the game! Don't be a sore loser when you can be sore in other places!
You’re not a talkative one, huh, Chell?
Oh, you two are twins, right? Clones?
Oh, I like the 1950’s look. It’s amazing how retro stuff gets me going.
D.Va? Like, the classic eSports star?
D.Va, do you stream combat missions?
You know, D.Va, I’ve heard a lot about Overwatch.
You stream, right, D.Va? With your bunny motif, I bet you've heard of Alice Rabbit!
A Scooby-Doo cosplayer! What a classic.
Well aren’t you sunny.
Daria is such an old lady name.
Why would I have wet nightmares? Are you hiding some uh… Something down there? Even if so, I’m into it.
Sorry, Daria, I may have tried peeking earlier… So...
Princess Elena of the Avalor district!
Whoa, Felicia! You're a hybrid, aren't you!?
So, I know the Gigavangelists actually employ a lot of white-furred hybrid nuns...
Futaba Sakura… Where have I heard that name before?
I have to ask, why aren’t you taking off those headphones?
I do like those thigh-highs, Futaba.
Futaba, if you’re looking for work after this…
I hope the shorts are next, but that’s just me.
Okay, so she’s got a lycra bodysuit. Let’s see what Gwen’s going to do.
Something good this time? Like, actually clothes?
Aww, you're adorable, Harley! You're going for the mime look, right?
Love the hair Harley, it goes great with your face paint.
Red and black hair with white paint, huh? Reminiscent of the United States before it broke up last decade. After the wars and all.
Jenetta! Is this a costume, or are you a hybrid of some sort?
So I see, you're a hostess of some sort... so I guess this isn't terribly unfamiliar.
So your tights are coming off... I bet we're going to see something else tight, huh?
Jenetta, I bet not needing your eyes to see comes in really handy in the dark...
So, is therian um... you people's word for hybrid? Um, I didn't mean "you people" you people.
Yes, Joey, I was in fact rooting for you to take off your shoes! Now strip 'em!
So, Joey, any more tricks up your sleeve?
You see lots of cool fashions in Glitch City... but wow Jolyne, you're stylish!
You know what they say, Jura, there's two types of people who wield swords...
You two are crewmates? How cute! What kind of ship do you fly?
Jura, I have another Earth expression, if you'd like...
Hmm… I know! I know, your boots, right? There's an Earth expression I bet Jura would like, Meia...
It's a good thing you're so good at reading people, Jura. You really like to show off your body, but in a game like this...
Meia, does Jura do this all the time?
Okay, so... what're you taking off now, Jura?
Meia, is Jura somewhat of an exhibitionist...?
Finally. You did a great job building tension, Jura...
A captain, and only aged 20? My, how old are you Jura, to be in such accomplished company?
It's not like it left much to the imagination... but I'm a simple Earth medic.
You look a little young, Kim… Let’s check to see what your ID Code says…
Stop right there! I’ve got a holo-recording of a wanted criminal of similar background!
A licensed detective! Wow! I guess it really does take all types to unwind here.
So, you’ve kept those gloves on for a while. What’s up with that, Kyoko?
Whoa, I haven’t seen that type of glider tech before.
Hey, Kyu, are you a stranger to the shocker?
Wait a second! Blonde hair, huge boobs, Neo-Brooklyn accent...!
Oh, gesundheit--
Holy crap, the Geiger counter in my sensor suite is going nuts when pointed at Lilith.
You brought a camera to the game? You remind me of my friend Nicole!
It's kind of fun that you brought a camera, Mahiru, but make sure everyone's okay with that before you start taking pictures...
Blue hair huh? Genetic scan is saying you're...
No can do, Marinette. Believe me, I've tried.
So, besides a yo-yo, what kind of other tricks do you have, Marinette? I carry a full belt. You seem a little...
You seem like you’re getting jittery, Marinette. Can I interest you in a drink?
Are you alright Meg? You seem very jittery.
Meg, why do you keep looking at the corner of the room? There's nothing there, I promise.
Boo! Haha, I'm sorry Meg, you're just so jumpy I thought scaring you would be funny!
Whoa, I’d like a taste of Mei’s milkshake.
I mean, I'm not doing anything after this. Let's see how tipsy I get though! I'd hate to give a bad impression.
Yeah, I'm not sure she and I would get along, given how rude she's been. Is she always like this, Jura?
Yikes, I’m all for the retro look, but that sec-monocle doesn’t exactly look comfortable!
Aww, what’s this all about, Meia? Not so fun when you’re losing, huh?
So wait, that eyepiece wasn’t functional?
So... Jura, is Meia single?
That’s a pretty advanced bodysuit, right?
You know, there’s cuter bras on earth.
Oh, another medic! Valkyrie tech too!
Mercy, I’m slightly regretting not seeing these wings you’re talking about...
What’s that casual wear look like, Mercy?
Oh! That tech is incredible. Did you develop that yourself?
Dr. Ziegler...
You’re the professional, doc. What kinda upkeep do you do?
Per subsection 104-A of the White Knight code of ethics, I am contractually obligated to refer you to our organization’s legal team, Mia.
Your scarf is so cute!
I haven’t met any really superstitious lawyers.
I don’t actually work with a lot of lawyers…
I'll drink to this, Mia! ...If I had one.
I mean, we can basically already see them…
I think the contradiction is you taking off your panties first, then being embarrassed... though I do know someone who's a little embarrassed by her chest.
Wow! I'd recognize that uniform anywhere!
I think you could use a drink-- or another, at least, Misato.
Hey, you there. Let me see some ID.
Whoa, Moon’s not here to take prisoners.
Wow, Moon, quick turnaround. You’re winning on your own terms, but I’m pretty sure that’s not how the game’s supposed to be played. Not that any of us seem to mind.
Yikes, Moon, you look really uncomfortable. It’s been a while since you’ve gone, huh?
Oh no! We have to let Moon strip, her hormones are dangerously high!
Heh, Moon’s up again, and it only took her a few hands to throw.
Ooh, bad luck Moon, you’ve been really patient, huh?
Excuse me Nagisa, I need to see some identification. That's a school uniform for Pete's sake!
Nagisa, it's a school night! Even if you're of age, you need your rest! Promise me you'll go straight home after this.
Who let you in, Nagisa? I need to give them a piece of my mind, letting a schoolgirl into a place like this...
Let me know if any of this gets to be too much for you. I'll make sure no one hurts you.
You remind me a bit of Dorothy, Natsuki! She's... also got a small frame.
Would you two barely-legal schoolgirls knock it off?
Huh, I already know one streamer… Do you know Streaming-chan, Nugi-chan?
Huh, Nugi-chan. Do you stream stuff like Nicole?
That's an excellent costume. Cosplay's one of Glitch City's largest businesses, though I have no idea how.
Yes yes yes!
Okay this time you’re going to--
Seriously, Mika! I want to see a special move!
This may be a strange thing to say, but I think I've seen your face on a Wanted hologram, Revy.
Revy, have... have you ever been to Japan? I was visiting relatives once and I saw someone who looked exactly like you. Were you travelling with a businessman?
I knew it! I have seen you Revy, on Thailand's most wanted list! You're extremely lucky that's out of my jurisdiction!
Thank you for putting the guns away, would've hated to have to file noise complaints. Those are modified Beretta 92FS, aren't they? I can tell they're modified by the extended barrel.
Thanks for giving up your Berettas. Yep, I actually know a whole lot about guns! Yours are customized with ivory grips and the barrel's an inch above regulation.
I'd say everyone could take their earplugs out now, but unfortunately, we still have Aimee firing away. Make due!
You know, Ruby, Yang seems really skittish about you being here. The shyness is adorable! I think you two would be cute together!
Ms. Rose, pardon me, but you seem a little immature. Can I see some form of ID?
I wonder, Ruby, if you’re the type of girl who’s really into self-care because of peer pressure from your team, or you’re still just naive enough not to bother with that kind of thing.
I wonder, Ruby, if you’re the type of girl who’s really into self-care because of peer pressure from your team, or you’re still just naive enough not to bother with that kind of thing.
Whoa! Samus Aran, in the flesh!
Oh hey, a Mobile Suit tech! Do you work on powered armor too, Sayla?
I like the tanlines, Sayla! It’s kinda cute!
Whoa, is that an Axolotl-class suit?
Huh, it says you're a boomer, Shazza. But not a cat boomer...
Oh, are the gloves coming off? I'm sorry, it's just too easy of a joke, guys! See, Sheena's laughing!
The gloves are coming off! There! I said it! Someone had to!
Whoa, someone's ready for battle.
Wait, Spooky, are you some kind of electric field experiment?
I don’t believe in ghosts. Are you some kind of hologram?
I caught some of your stream last weekend, Nicole, though it cut off because I'm not a premium member. Ten guys, five girls, and several dozen dildos must have made for quite the night!
I've been wondering, how do you power that camera? I assume you have portable batteries, but it must be a pain to make sure they're always charged.
Make sure your camera's at the best angle.
I wish you'd drink with me, Nicole, but from what I saw last night it's a miracle you're still walking.
Have I ever mentioned how much I love your eyes? You look just like...
Did you know you were the top stream on jitter.tv last Friday? You had over five million people watching!
I wish I could grow my hair out like yours! Military standards are a pain in the ass sometimes.
Do you ever take your camera off? You know, it's probably healthy to have some privacy. Not that I should be advocate that, being an officer and all.

Nicole, did you hear what happened to Rad Shiba last week? Apparently he snuck up on Dorothy and she taught him a lesson by shaving off half his fur before Dana could separate them. I feel bad for him but he brought it on himself!
Wait, Mahiru, are you not filmingon your camera?
Of course she is! She's Streaming-chan after all. You're taking pictures, aren't you, Mahiru?
You have an audio/visual distortion option on your stream, right? I don't have a problem being on it but my superiors would be mad if I was identified.
Hi Nicole! I haven't seen you in VA-11 HALL-A in a while. Have you found a trashy bar yet?
Heya Nicole, didn't know you were in this part of town!
Nicole! I haven't seen you in VA-11 HALL-A in a while. Have you found a trashy bar to entertain your viewers in yet?
You wouldn't believe what she does during peak hours, Mahiru!
Sssh... Mahiru, it's an act, silly. I think. Mostly.
Whoa!
You’re gonna go in reverse, aren’t you, Twilight?
What’s next, Twilight?
What's next, Twilight?
Slumming it tonight Miss…?
Well well, looks like that combat skirt is hides something very adventurous.
You're a yoga trainer?! I love yoga! And weight training, and cardiovascular exercise, and pretty much everything that gets the heart pumping!
I have to say, I like the nipply look on you, Trainer.
You know, Yang, Ruby seems really skittish about you being here. The shyness is adorable! I think you two would be cute together!
You've fought zombies? Are you talking about the nuclear meltdown in the United States ten years ago?
Zone-tan, do you have an importer’s permit for this… “Lenny” of yours?
Zone-tan? I've heard of the name but I thought you were the animator.
Wow, you are just awful at this.
That quickly?
You lost, take it off!
We get it, you're hot. You and everyone else at the table...
I never got to go through the slutty college girl phase.
Be sure to stash that somewhere safe.
It's fun to win!
Sorry you lost, but it had to be someone.
There’s no need to resort to violence!
But usually there’s like a sex thing involved. Or a mnemonic.
Oh! This is quite the look for you, Amalia!
I know a lot of duelists in Mixed Media Martial Arts use the SAO set. Why don’t you lower your projector though?
Hmm… Your ID is showing up as a certified “Vampire Slayer,” that’s an odd sort of professional title. I guess you can get certified for just about anything these days, huh?
Hmm… Your ID is showing up as a “vampire slayer.” I hope you and Marceline can keep it civil.
Kinda hard to play well when you're so distracted, right?
Yeah, nothing like taking off the boots after a long day, right?
If you want me to help you from behind, I'm certainly amenable.
ID’d as an…employee of Aperture Labs? Wow, really?
I try to keep an open mind, but are you sure this is a good idea?
Wait a second, are you that hacker, Medjed?
Are they compression, or something like that? Nanite tracery?
Anyway... I'm enjoying all the stuff you have going on here, Jenetta!
I agree, Jenetta, though when a Valkyrie says it, it's usually about horrific bleeding or pathogen containment.
Oh, huh. “Kimberly Possible, Fixer.” Whoa! You’ve had a Fixer license for a few years now.
Oh. Oh god.
Dang, Lilith, read a bit too many superhero comics? Eridium doping’s been banned for years.
Okay, you sure you don't want me to take a picture? Once is hot, but twice is definitely showing off.
Wouldn’t it just sort of float away? In space?
It's fancy armor. But I wonder if Meia'll drop her guard now, Jura, or is she going to get more defensive?
Our squad didn’t really get the whole healy-beam thing. But that seems to be a little harder to reproduce than we had the budget for...
I think Deal over there is doing a great job cataloguing everyone's stuff, Misato. It won't get filthy...
Are you gonna--
Huh. Crusty socks?
Not into feet, Mahiru?
Nicole, did you get that Kevlar-weave outer shell I told you about?
I'm not above bribes, Nicole. If you wanted to slip me some premium action.
You know it’s a crime to smuggle off-world biologics without a permit.
You have a very nice penis.
No, don't cover it up, I wanna see!
C'mon, Sei, stay professional.
It's pretty hot that you're keeping the blindfold on for this. If I didn't already know that you could see through it, I might...
Now that’s a Crevice Spike I wouldn’t mind putting my lips to.
Hey, Bartender! Can I get a Crevice Spike? It looks like Pit’s going to get a Bad Touch. Actually, no need for the Crevice Spike, I think Akko’s about to get one of those for herself!
Can we get a Flaming Moai for the table? It looks like things are getting hot between Pit, Pinkie, ~player~, and Witchy.
Looks like Pit's earned a bonus stage!
Looks like Pit's earned a bonus stage!
Hey, Bartender! Can I get a Crevice Spike? It looks like Pit’s going to get a Bad Touch. Actually, no need for the Crevice Spike, I think Natsuki’s about to get one of those for herself!
So do you guys have pizza boys on futuristic bikes too or is that just a regional thing?
You're in a corner now, but I'm not going to take it easy on you. I think you'll put up a fight.
I'm not counting you out. I've seen people high on mega heroin take ten bullets and not stop.
It's okay if you want to act embarrassed, but if this isn't for you, it might be best to back out...
Oh I see. You're a roleplayer! It's very elaborate, the whole "knightley maiden" thing. I usually just pretend to be "beat cop capturing naughty criminal" when Stella asks.
Damn, that was lucky. Aimee, be careful!
Why don't you drop a few credits and buy a round, and I'll make sure to show you how a White Knight plays!
Say, Bartender, how about a Zen Star for me and Ms. Sharm over here? I bet she likes to keep her elements balanced.
...some of them are even true! Heiresses do have that certain confidence...
I think the two of you would have a lot to talk about. And a lot to show off.
You sure showed me Annie. I’d hate for you to take your panties off next.

text.content: That was kind of fun, huh, Meia…? Riiiight?

content.i: You wake up. It’s warm, it’s soft...but it’s lonely. There’s a card on the nightstand.

text.content: “We had to go to work, but it was fun having you over.
There’s coffee in the kitchen, feel free to grab one of the Hoshii Dynamics cups, but be out before the maid arrives.
Have a great day, and maybe we’ll see you again in VA11 HALL-A or the Inventory.
-S+S”
